# Choco Banana (Connected Squares)

This is a [Choco Banana](https://puzz.link/rules.html?cbanana) with the added constraint that all square regions must be diagonally connected.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/chocoBananaConnectedSquares1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
